message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase a high-quality product that I think you'll really appreciate. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150. Let me know if you're interested!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob, but I'm afraid I need to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $125. Would you be willing to go that high?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not sure I can go up to $125. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $110?

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make a bit more of a compromise, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I can sell it to you for $120. Is that a price you'd be comfortable with?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm trying to stay within my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $115?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one last concession. I can sell the product to you for $122. That's as low as I'm willing to go. Is that a price you'd be willing to accept?
